issue.title: [C++] OneShotFragment ignoring batch readahead & batch size
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16258](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16258). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The OneShotFragment is currently queuing up to 32 record batches regardless of the batch size and batch readahead settings in the scanner.  It should be updated to work like the other fragments.
